description: Slow cooked beef shin makes a rich and meltingly tender filling for this impressive beef pie.
name: Slow Cooked Beef Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1L beef stock, made with 2 stock cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the beef shin in flour in a large bowl, working in batches if necessary. Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the beef for 2-3 minutes to seal on all sides, working in batches. Place on a plate with a slotted spoon.

Drizzle more oil into the pan and cook the onions, carrots, celery, parsnips and rosemary for 8-10 minutes, until softened. Add the beef and pour over the stock. Cover and cook for 1.5 hours, remove the lid and cook for 30 minutes, until the beef is tender and sauce has reduced. Remove the rosemary sprigs.

Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. To assemble the pie, pour the beef and vegetable mix into a large ovenproof dish and top with puff pastry. Brush the pastry with butter, cut a steam hole in the middle and bake for 25 minutes, until golden.
